scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Trinity, with two figures resembling Christ seated side-by-side, holding an open book between them. A dove, symbolizing the Holy Spirit, hovers above the book. The figure on the right holds a crown topped with a cross. Both figures are robed and have halos, indicating their divine nature. Behind them, a red drapery is pulled back, revealing a multitude of faces and wing-like forms, possibly representing angels or a heavenly host. The figures are seated on a golden platform, suggesting a celestial setting. The overall composition is framed by an ornate border with foliate motifs.
